abstracts.cdata!:
The objective of the Skills for
            Inclusive Growth Project for Organization of Eastern
            Caribbean States (OECS) is to support the Government of
            Grenada to increase the employability of youth through
            public and private sector partnerships for technical and
            life skills training that is demand driven. The first
            category of expenditure has been revised to allow for
            explicit recognition of non-consultant services as eligible
            expenditures under the proceeds of the credit. While the
            project appraisal document makes clear reference to
            non-consultant services, the inclusion of this type of
            expenditure was inadvertently omitted from the financing
            agreement dated March 19, 2009. The financing agreement was
            amended to reflect this change and to also include a
            definition of non-consultants services and make reference to
            them in the procurement section.
